<title level="1" right="Rules">[Proficiencies](/Rules.aspx?ID=1604)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 32</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Your construct companion is trained in its unarmed attacks, unarmored defense, all saving throws, Perception, [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1), and [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3). Construct companions can't use abilities that require greater Intelligence, such as [Coerce](/Actions.aspx?ID=52) or [Decipher Writing](/Actions.aspx?ID=22), even if trained in the appropriate skill, unless they have an ability that allows it.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
